jd: From: Paul, Rwaltz paul@rwaltz.com Reply to: paul@rwaltz.com Position: Full Stack E-Commerce Architect (Ecommerce/Retail Domain Experience)Contract Type: Long ContractLocation: San Francisco, CA (3 Days Hybrid per Week Onsite)Description:• It’s a senior architect role. Hybrid—3 days per week onsite would be fine.Must Have Skills:• Java expertise along with some ATG/e-commerce tools and any CMS experience is a must.• Contentful or Content Stack would be the top preference for CMS, but we are fine with any other CMS experience as well.• 3 days per week for onsite is mandatory.• Must be a hands-on architect who can code as well when required.Skills/Experience:10+ years of experience, with significant years in a retail and e-commerce environment.Good communication skills, both verbal and written—for building relationships, managing stakeholders, working with clients, and delivery teams.High energy levels and tolerance for tight deadlines and time pressures.Proven analytical, logical thinking, and problem-solving skills.Experience gained in a Senior Architect role, leading or mentoring a small team of more technical leads and engineers, able to guide them, review their work, and drive best practices.Experience with Vendor Evaluation, RFP, and RFP processes.Significant understanding of and experience in best practices around systems integration, security, performance, and data management.Experience with Microservices.Expertise/Exposure in one or more of the following:Significant experience with high-volume consumer-facing eCommerce or other web applications.Experience with Digital and Omnichannel initiatives.Experience with implementing Chatbot and Chat solutions on e-commerce sites.Experience in Stores/Store Digital systems.Hands-on experience with web (Java, J2EE, Angular/React/jQuery, Java, REST, etc.) and mobile (Kotlin, iOS, Android, Swift, Objective-C, etc.) technologies.
